inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: STEC stx1/stx2 were found in stools

inclusion.criterion: Room air oxygen saturation of 92% or greater
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Physical exam was remarkable for pallor, jaundice

inclusion.criterion: Negative for hepatitis B surface antigen
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Seronegative for hepatitis C antibody unless antigen negative
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to understand and sign the Informed Consent Document
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Measurable malignancy as defined by at least one of the criteria below
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Peripheral blood smear showed a moderate number of schistocytes and helmet cells

exclusion.criterion: Patients with Hodgkin lymphoma are no longer eligible for participation (as of amendment G, Protocol version: 08/12/2019)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients that require urgent therapy due to tumor mass effects or spinal cord compression.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with lymphoma masses 10.0 cm or larger in longest diameter will not be eligible.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients that have active hemolytic anemia.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who are currently taking any medications for systemic anticoagulation other than aspirin will not be eligible.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a history of vomiting, non-bloody diarrhea, abdominal pain, fever, chills and loss of appetite for the past 3 days. He ate a salad at a restaurant prior to his diarrhea onset.
